Package com.arjuna.CosRecovery

Interface Summary
ExpiryScanner Interface for Expiry scanner plug-ins.
RecoveryModule Interface for Recovery manager plug-in module.
 

Class Summary
ExpiredEntryMonitor Threaded object to run ExpiryScanner implementations to scan the action store to remove items deemed expired by some algorithm.
Info Info object provides build information for this module
PeriodicRecovery Threaded object to perform the periodic recovery.
RecManAdmin Implementation of the RecoveryManager admin IDL interface
RecoveryClassLoader Support for the dynamic loading of classes.
RecoveryConfiguration This class contains various run-time configuration options.
RecoveryEnablement Registers the appropriate classes with the ORB.
RecoveryEnvironment Container for property names used by recovery
RecoveryManager The RecoveryManager daemon
RecoveryManagerImple The RecoveryManagerImple - does the real work.
RecoveryManagerPinger Calls "Admin::RecoveryManagerAdmin::ping()" on the RecoveryManager at intervals
